txt.en: Poisonous mushrooms can be found at Brúvraum in western Máttugard.\n\nYou should burn the poisonous mushrooms.
Poisonous mushrooms can be found at Brúvraum in western Máttugard.\n\nYou should burn the poisonous mushrooms.

The passage of Brúvraum has become a vile insect hive where gredbyg have claimed this area in Máttugard. Growing around the hives are a variety of poisonous mushrooms. Máttugard is not the place for this invasive fungus, and for that the mushrooms should be destroyed.
The passage of Brúvraum has become a vile insect hive where gredbyg have claimed this area in Máttugard.
